1.content:
Okay just gonna clear this up the MC will be simply known as (Your Name) regardless if your a man or girl to make this less of a headache.

Now that that's cleared up are you a guy or girl?
1.title: Male or Female?

11.content: You are (Your Name) an 18 year old boy, you live with your parents & 10 year old sister Jackie. Currently you're playing one of the Kingdom hearts games not noticing the bad storm going on outside. You pause the game for a moment to reminisce, You've loved the Kingdom Hearts series ever sense you were little. However there's one character you can't get out of your mind no matter how hard you try. Was it a guy or a girl?
11.title: The begining

1111.content: Okay so you've got sora stuck in your head but that's not all you also wanted to indulge in your interesting quark what is your fetish?
1111.title: Sora

choices: KH 1/Chain of memories outfit(notihing's wrong with his outfit..yet anyway)
KH 2 outfit(He's got no shoes on)
It's Sora from birth by sleep (He's got no sandals on)
1111331.content:
(Ok now that that's outta the way we can get back to the story)

You've always had that weird combo of traits for game characters but it shows the most with Sora. Because of that though it's led to some awkward moments between you & your family. Your thoughts are interupted suddenly as a bolt of lightning flashes outside and the power goes out.

"(Your Name)! Can you go down and check the circuit beaker?" Your mom asks from the kitchen. "Sure mom just give me a sec!" You reply as you get up take out your cell & use the flashlight function to see where the door to the basement is and head down.

A few moments later you find the breaker & flick all the switches that had been flipped off. Then all the lights & other electronics come back on, a few seconds later your mom appears at the top of the stairs and says "Thanks honey!" "No problem mom." You say beginning to head back up stairs until Jackie shows up with a flabbergasted look on her face. "Bro, I think you might want to come see this!" She says bolting into the living room you following right behind her.

As soon as you reach the living room however you stop dead in your tracks as you notice the TV flashing static, the screen flashes brightly until a figure appears on the couch unconscious. You recognize the figure right away as sora. However, something's off it's his outfit! He's wearing his..
1111331.title: Feet/sock & tickling

11113311.content:
In your mind, you can already see his shoes missing. But they aren't. You were simply imagining things. Just to double check you look him over. Though most of the time your eyes were locked on his feet. You snap out of it and pick him up, running to your room. Quickly you lay him down and shut your door.

When you turn back, your heart skips a beat. Somehow his shoes had slipped half way down his socked feet. You practically fainted at the site. It was too perfect to resist.
11113311.title: KH 1/Chain of memories outfit(notihing's wr...

choices: Your hormones take over and you start worshipping
111133112.content:
You wanted.......no.......you NEEDED him awake for the real fun to start. And what better way to wake someone than with some lovely tickles.

Slowly you knelt down in front of his feet. A rather strong aroma hit you as you did. Though rather than backing away, you can't help but become a bit aroused. Biting your lip to keep yourself quite, you slowly trace a single finger down his sole. His feet twitch and his shoes fall the rest of the way to the floor. You can't help but grin wickedly. Without wasting another second you dive in with all ten fingers wiggling. It takes no time before your room is filled with boyish laughter. Though oddly enough, he's not pleading for you to stop. But rather, to keep going.
111133112.title: Tickle alarm

choices: Sora introduces himself & the family begins asking questions
The family introduces themselves & Sora asks them questions
1111331121.content:
You decide to keep tickling him for another 20 minutes until you get your fill on tickling for today & to let Sora get a breather after the ticklish moment you put him through.

You hold out your hand for him & say "Well now that your awake I suppose it's time you meet the family." He gives you a nod in response as he takes your hand in his own to get up before fallowing you downstairs. Who introduces themselves first?
1111331121.title: Getting your fill & some answers

11113312.content:
You realize Sora is wearing his KH2 outfit but what's off about it is that he doesn't have any shoes on which makes you happy on the inside sense you've fantasized about this type of situation in your head for years and now it's become reality & with him being 18 just like you that's a big bonus on your end!

After you bring Sora into the guest bedroom you look back at him with a mixture of wonder & worry on your face you have so many questions on your mind such as: Why is he in our world, HOW is he here? However your questions will have to wait until he regains consciousness.

The next morning you wake up, make your bed & clean yourself up before heading out of your bedroom in a t-shirt a pair of sandals & shorts. As your about to pass the guest bedroom however you begin to hear a noise coming from the room which can only mean one thing, Sora's awake. You bolt right to the stairs and shout out, "Drop everything now! Sora's awake!"

Without waiting for everyone else you go straight to the guest bedroom door & open it, there standing on both feet like he had never even been out in the first place is Sora. He then raises an eyebrow at you and says "Uhh, hi..." as everyone else (minus your mother whom is making breakfast at the moment) comes into the room. Who starts asking questions?
11113312.title: back in the realm of the living

11133.content: All right how about these guys?
11133.title: Next!

choices: Attack of the Really Big Namine
You suddenly become micro sized or she does
11221.content: Sorry about all these incredibly short chapters but what happens to her?
11221.title: Shrinking & Giant/giantess fetish

choices: Ask if you can tickle her
Instantly start tickling her without permission
11222.content: Upon seeing the blonde witch pop out from your PS2 you are instantly enslaved or to be more specific enchanted by her beauty "Whoa!" Is all you can say when she appears highly confused looking around her whereabouts "Huh? Where am I? What is this place?" Then she spots you and says shyly "Huh? Who are you?" As she studies your odd clothes you meanwhile are staring at her in turn not in that sort of way though..." Hello well aren't you going to respond?" She asks for a few minutes you can't bring yourself to answer Namine takes this as you being rude and a sudden urge comes over you and you
11222.title: Tickling fetish

112221.content:
You quickly rushed over to Namine to prevent her from leaving she stopped and looked at you "What are you doing?" You take your time to say your next choice of words carefully
"Please wait Namine I didn't mean to be rude and not speak I'm not deaf it's more that I was so enchanted Er I mean...." Then finally she smiled at you.


"So you can talk after all and here I thought you were the silent one....so tell me how is it you know my name?" You showed her the PS2 game cover and explain it to her and she nods after a while "Okay you have convinced me so since I'm stuck here for the time being what do you want to do?"

You immediately know the answer to this (she's wearing her normal white dress and sandals from KH2 and in Chain of memories) you whisper what you want to do in her ear and Namine gasped "Oh! So you wish to tickle my belly button!"(she glances down at her dress covered stomach in surprise) well that's a bit embarrassing but....How do you intend to get to my belly button with me in my dress?"

Namine asks you as you begin to rub your chin in thought "That's a good question Namine I guess we could go get some new clothes for you, or we can just lift up your dress and get the tickling underway. What do you think we should do Namine?" Namine mulls this over and decides to..
112221.title: Ask if you can tickle her

choices: You decided to give her a break
She knocked you over and climbed on you, she was now going to tickle you
1122212.content:
"As long as you don't try to reach for anything else, I'll take my shirt off." She says. You agreed to it, after all, you would never insult her on purpose. You watch her take off her dress, leaving her in a bra and panties. Her bellybutton is wide open, yet you resist the urge to tickle her. Naminé stretches out on the couch. "Alright, go ahead. Please go slow at first." She says.

You step towards her and kneel next to her. As requested, you start to slowly tickle her. She starts to giggle a little. Unfortunately, it wasn't enough for you. You needed to tickle more. You started to tickle more than before, her giggling soon turned into laughing. You used both of your hands to not only tickle her bellybutton, but to also tickle her side. Naminé tried to grab your arm, but you were too strong.

"Please . . haha . . stop" she managed to get out. You kept going though. You loved this situation, tickling a pleading victim in a warm house as it was cold and wet outside. You started to go for her feet. "Oh no . . . Please, anywhere but there!" She pleaded, tears of laughter were going down her soft cheeks. You kept going until . . .
1122212.title: It's too wet to go to the store

11233.content: A princess of heart or a Final Fantasy girl
11233.title: More

choices: Alice grows really big or you shrink very small
You start tickling the Victorian ten year old nonstop
1123311.content: Alice huh? Excellent choice so what happens to you or her?
1123311.title: Alice

choices: Alice grows and grows and grows.....
You shrink to tiny micro size
11233111.content: Of all the characters from KH to pop out out of your PS game system the 1951 Disney Alice is the last person you'd expect to appear but yet here she is in all her game pixel CGI formation rather than her animated version your jaw is dropped nonetheless at the Victorian ten year old as soon as she sees you Alice gasps "Oh my where am I and more importantly who are you?" She asked with pure childlike curiosity for a while you can't respond until she wanders around your room looking at all your stuff picking up a few of your CDS,other game controllers,clothes etc to examine them "How incredibly odd what is all this stuff?" She asks herself then turns back to you "Hello my name is Alive can you please tell me how I got here?" Finally you get the nerve to speak "Uh you popped out of my game system,my PlayStation..." Alice arches her eyebrows "Playstation? Game system? I'm sorry I don't quite understand." You direct her to your game system showing it to her and trying to explain how it works though you know all this technology talk is probably messing with Alice's poor brain but she nods somewhat understanding then following a brief introduction you ask whether or not she's hungry she nods "Yes very much but I'm afraid any food you may offer me might be poison no offense but luckily I have managed to save a mushroom or two in my pocket...." As she pulls out a tiny piece of mushroom from her right dress pocket and eats it she also graciously offers you the other piece but little do you know dire consequences await the both of you the moment you eat the juicy sweet fungi what happens?
11233111.title: Alice grows really big or you shrink very small

112331111.content: Within minutes of swallowing the tiny piece of mushroom Alice immediately begins to rapidly expand in size and height all you can say is a very loud "Uh oh! Bad idea very bad idea!" As she began filling up the room you barely had time to rush out grabbing a few of your personal stuff including your phone and game system who knows you still might need it Alice seemed to be totally unaware what was occurring as she grew bigger and bigger and soon enough your whole house was in serious danger of being flattened by this game pixel of a Disney character "Alice!!" You screamed frantically as her foot came right through the front door and her head burst through the roof Oh My!" She cried out finally realizing what was going on as BOOOM! the entire house exploded luckily you managed to get out ahead of time all you could see was a thick layer of smoke Alice's own face which appeared to be getting larger by the minute couldn't be seen at all(But you knew she seemed to grow even bigger than when she was stuck in the Rabbit's House)it was a good thing none of your neighbors were around or else this could be a living nightmare seeing a young girl at Godzilla size like this by the time the smoke finally cleared you had a clear view of Alice's face which was utterly bewildered and frightened at the same time "Oh My...." She said again when she spoke a few things on the ground went flying "I.....I...I'm terribly sorry but I forgot about me growing to giant size whenever I eat something I accidentally destroyed your house I'm truly sorry about that!" She cried out as she tried not to move in case something else was damaged but you were more worried about her current size than anything else by the way just how big was she?
112331111.title: Alice grows and grows and grows.....

1123312.content: Which other princess do you want?
1123312.title: Another one

info.brief_description: Just like my second interactive but this time with the Kingdom Hearts franchise
info.description:
The only real rules for this are no bad grammar or text slang. Now on to fetish restrictions the only ones that will have limits are weight gain scat & waterspouts the limit on weight gain is so we don't have characters gaining 1 million lbs. in just a few seconds. That doesn't make sense. As for the last two that should be obvious.

Other then that go crazy & add what you like. Have fun reader's!
